item.description:
Game night is on once again at my home in Concord, starting at 8 pm on Wednesday, April 13 and going on from there. Feel free to suggest games that you want to play, although we'll probably audible based on who shows up at the door.

On a related topic, I've pulled dozens of titles from my collection in an effort to clear out space on the shelves and get the piles off the floor. Lots of good games for sale, along with lots of middling ones and a single copy of Smiley Face. I have general guidelines for pricing, but I'm open to lowball offers as I primarily just want stuff out of my house. No list yet for those who want to browse for bargains – you need to come by and check out the stacks!

Eric
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
